title: Not able to send emails from one of two AOL accounts
content: After changing my AOL passwords for two accounts today, I was able to generate a login password from AOL and log into Thunderbird with my AOL accounts. However, one of the two accounts will not send email from Thunderbird, but will on my iPhone and iPad. The other AOL account is working fine. I also verified that the SMTP port is 465. So I have done everything on my end, I think there's a Thunderbird glitch.
creator: cg.risd5

title: Importing email from MBOX Zip file
content:

title: Backing up e-mails from profile without the settings
content:
I recently had to transfer the domain associated with my e-mail account. With help from the admins at the domain registry, I altered the account settings in Thunderbird. I got errors which said: "Sending of usernamedid not succeed. Mail server pop.servername responded: invalid format for plain response" The server settings were: Connection security: STARTTLS Authentication method: Normal Password We changed Connection security to SSL/TLS We still got the same response.

I set up Thunderbird on a laptop in the same house, & the account was working fine, both sending and receiving. The only problem was that the e-mails in the inbox were from that point in time and all my old e-mails were not shown.

I have tried backing up the profile on my original computer, uninstaling and re-installing Thunderbird, and I nstill get the same problem. So I am thinking backup the e-mails from the profile, remove everything Thunderbird, (Program + profile), from the original computer, then re-install Thunderbird and setup the account (as I did on the laptop), and then restore the old e-mails if the account is successfully working. The problem that I have with this approach is I do not know how to backup & restore just the e-mails from a profile without all the other settings and configurations associated with that profile.

Any advice with regards to this situation would be gratefully received.

Regards,

Neil Harland
creator: cct667

title: Recover Thunderbird 138.0 classic compact view in TB 139.0
content: Hello all,  ;-) I just upgraded from TB 138.0 to 139.0. The message display style changed from a simple compact list to something still called "compact view" but is a far cry from being compact (see adjoined pix). How can I recover the former list display of messages I had with Thunderbird 138.0 ? Tx.
creator: Cbhihe

title: Farbdarstellung in Email (Thunderbird) und Webseite (Firefox)
content:
Guten Tag Gemeinde und Helfer, Ich bin 81 Jahre und habe meinen Laptop entsprechend für meinen Augen eingestellt. Nun stelle ich fest das zwei der folgenden Probleme bestehen: 1. Die farbliche Hervorherbung von Wörtern in Thunderbird funktioniert nicht. D.h. ich kann keine Schriftfarbe ändern.

2. Beim Aufruf von Webseiten (z.Bsp.: https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Atomwaffenverbotsvertrag) wird die unterschiedliche Farbmarkierung in der Legende von Grafiken falsch angezeigt. D.h. die Legende ist allles in Schwarz.

Ich habe in der zwischen Zeit folgende Lösungsversuche durchgeführt: 1. Neuinstallation 2. Durchlesen und Suche im Hilfeforum

Ich hoffe Sie können mir Weiterhelfen.

Mit freundlichen Grüßen Margot Eppinger
creator: margoteppinger
